body.name: Furnulem Queen Size Bed Frame with Headboard and LED Lights,Upholstered Bedframe with Charging Station and USB Port, Platform Metal Bed Frame,No Box Spring Needed, Noise Free
features: 【Storage Headboard with Charging Station】: This Queen bed frame built -in 2 standard power outlet & 2 USB Ports, it is very convenient for you to charge your electronics and use light to read within easy reach. 3.9’’ wide storage headboard provides you with extra place to store phone, photo, glasses, clock and books within easy reach.

【Smart RGB LED and Mesh Headboard 】:Multifunctional LED lights strips, beautiful 29 RGB LED Light colors (There are over 60000 colors to choose from),Mobile App +Remote Control multiple control modes. You can freely set the brightness, color, mode and timing functions to create various scenes. The unique metal mesh headboard make the atmosphere more live

【Headboard and Footboard】:Gray upholstered headboard with breathable and wear resistant linen fabric add a unique feeling that makes your bed not only comfortable but also more creative.The design of headboard and footboard complements a variety of decor styles and keeps your mattress in place, suitable the mattress/mattress box spring max 8-14 inch in height

【Sturdy Stable and Noise Free】:Queen size bed made of sturdy metal structure with 13 heavy-duty metal slats and 11 support legs, which enhance the stability and durability of the platform bed. Weight capacity 1000lbs +. A memory foam strip pastes the center bar will prevent noise from metal-on-metal rubbing.

【Under-Bed Storage】: This platform bed frame with headboard has 12.5” under-bed storage space, with plenty space to hold your belongings, like luggage, organizers etc, and it’s easy to clean under-bed space without dust remaining.

【Minimalist design and easy assemble 】 :Industrial Bed frame with rustic look of its iron and kiln-dried engineered wood construction . Complete instructions book and labeled pieces , you can easily complete it between the age of 10 and 70 years old. If you have further questions, Furnulem team is always online to assist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superior quality and easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: First-my review is NOT part of any compensation or sweepstakes-it is honest and I am not being paid to say this!I was pleasantly surprised by this bed. The quality is great, I do wish it fit the queen mattress better, but it is sturdy and nice. This is for my 18 year old son, so I can’t tell you how well it will hold up after months or years of use, but I feel like it will be good for a long time. The lights are a nice bonus. He really is enjoying this and it looks good in his room. I started to put this together myself and would have been able to get it done in an hour or so, my husband came in to help and we finished in less than an hour.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my teenage son. He picked it out. I was wary because the price to be honest. It is good quality and easy to assemble. Nice and sturdy and doesn’t make any squeaking noises which is great! He is very happy with the extra space he has and the shelf at the head of the bed. He didn’t use the light strip on his bed because it is very short, but he found another use that is happy with. Overall very satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid frame with cool lighting
reviews.reviewText: Bed frame is very solid, nice headboard and lights top off the appearance. Good Buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm fairly pleased with this purchase. I did think the headboard would be a little bigger but I think my mattress and topper swallowed it up. Very easy set up. Seems extremely sturdy up to 1200 pounds as I'm plus size with a very heavy mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this bed frame for my 12 year old son. He loves it! I loved that it was easy to assemble. It took me approximately 45 minutes total. Highly recommend for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this frame way more than I expected!
reviews.reviewText: I had the same queen-sized mattress and frame for the last 10 years. My original frame had wooden slats. I thought that my mattress was sinking inward. My wooden slats were also starting to bend. I was going to buy a new bed frame and then a mattress separately since they can be expensive to purchase together. So, I started by purchasing this frame. I liked the idea that it has a platform to store my phones and tablets as well as a built-in electrical unit to plug my devices into. I'm an older, lightweight female who is about 5 feet tall. I actually put the frame together by myself, even though the instructions state that one should have a partner help them. Putting it together by myself was no problem at all. The only problem I had an issue with was the placement of the LED lights around the bed. I originally was not going to install them, but I did so and didn't do a good job. (Maybe that is what the partner could be used for. (lol)). But since that's not the main reason for my purchase, it's fine. After I placed my old mattress on this frame, I realized that my mattress is firm and sturdy and not sinking in, even after all these years. Purchasing this wonderful frame just saved me the money I would have spent on purchasing it and a new mattress. I'm considering buying another set of frames for one of my kids now (he also has a frame with wooden slats). This was a great purchase and I would recommend it to others. 5/5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and very stable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value For The Money
reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy putting together. Directions are fair, but need more detail.
